items.title: AI Creation

items.title: Preview and Apply

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say

items.name: Jessica Lee
items.comment: The gesture generation feature is a game-changer! It made my presentations so much more engaging.

items.name: David Smith

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Discover answers to common queries about our AI gesture generation feature.

items.title: What types of gestures can be generated?
items.description: Our AI can create a variety of gestures such as waving, pointing, nodding, clapping, and more, all designed to enhance interaction in virtual environments.

items.title: Is there a cost associated with using this feature?
items.description: The basic gesture generation feature is accessible for free with a limited number of uses; additional features and higher volume capabilities are available through subscription plans.

items.title: Can I use the generated gestures in my commercial projects?
items.description: Yes, users with a subscription can use generated gestures for commercial purposes, while free-tier users are restricted to personal projects.

items.title: How does privacy work with gesture generation?
items.description: All commands and generated gestures are processed locally, ensuring your data remains private and secure, with no uploads to external servers.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Virtual Interactions?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience the power of automated gesture generation. No sign-up required.
